title: BRIEF-Traka Resources Says Cobalt Qld To Sell To Co Its Remaining 45.6% Equity In The Gorge Creek JV
text:
BRIEF-Traka Resources Says Cobalt Qld To Sell To Co Its Remaining 45.6% Equity In The Gorge Creek JV

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 04, 2019 08:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Traka Resources Says Cobalt Qld To Sell To Co Its Remaining 45.6% Equity In The Gorge Creek JV Sept 4 (Reuters) - Traka Resources Ltd : * COBALT QLD HAS AGREED TO SELL TO TRAKA ITS REMAINING 45.6% EQUITY IN THE GORGE CREEK JV FOR 30 MILLION TRAKA SHARES * TRANSACTION IS VALUED AT $390,000

BRIEF-Traka Resources Says Cobalt Qld To Sell To Co Its Remaining 45.6% Equity In The Gorge Creek JV
